case.state: Hello, everyone! My name's Charlie! I'm the princess of Hell. It's super nice to meet you!
Hello! My name's Charlie! Demon Princess of Hell! It's a pleasure to meet you.
Pleasure to make your acquaintance! My name's Charlie. Princess of Hell. You don't have to say the whole thing.
Um... hello, Miss...? How do you know my name? A web series? What are you talking about?
Oh, hello! I didn't know another one of my kind would be playing, too!
Wow, another demon? Um... say, when this is over, I won't tell anyone back home that you're here if you don't tell anyone I'm here, alright?
Always nice to see another one like me at the table!
Hmmm... I get the sense that there are criminals at this table. I'm starting to have second thoughts about this.
Hmmm... There are criminals at this table... Maybe I can try to reform them?
Wow... an angel playing strip poker along with the Princess of Hell. This isn't too awkward, is it? Should I leave?
Wow, an actual angel is playing strip poker with me! You know, our hotel has a patron named Angel! He really isn't an angel, though.
Wow, an angel is playing strip poker with me? Care to get a bit devilish?
I'm a demon, little guy! The princess of Hell, in fact. And what are you? You look like a basketball!
In my family, we know all about deals, and you have made a good one! But let's see what comes of this, shall we?
Mmm, well, I hope they are at least known for good reasons...
Erm, yes, that's what I said. I know how this sounds, but Hell isn't as bad as you probably think it is, trust me!
This'll be the best ladies night since the time Vaggie and I finished our scrapbook!
This bunch of gals is about to have one Helluva night!
What better way to spend your evening than with a deck of cards and a couple of your favorite ladies? Maybe a little deviance on the side, who knows?
Nothing but us ladies, a deck of cards, and some deviant desires. What could possibly go wrong?
Just us ladies? Sweet! If this turns into a pillow fight slumber party, I wouldn't complain!
I'm not used to the living world, so please forgive my unfamiliarity with everything up here.
I hope I don't step on any toes or anything. I'm not used to the living world, so I'm... probably going to stand out a little.
So... the living world... I'm not familiar with it. Like, at all. I hope I don't freak anybody out!
These cards are fine. I'll keep them.
I'll exchange ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, please!
May I have ~cards.text~, dealer?
I'm actually going to stay with the hand I've got. That's cool, right?
I think I'll stick with what I have. That's allowed, right?
I'm not switching any of these. That's how you know I've got a great hand, right? Big dicked move.
Uhh, I think I'm holding. Like, not exchanging any cards.
These are perfect! I don't need to switch any out this time.

Bro, you seriously need to find something better to do than to snoop through my lines in the character editor. Go on a walk. Read a book. Hug your dad. I don't care. Anything's better than reading this.
I think I'll exchange ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I'll have ~cards.text~, please!
May I have ~cards.text~, please?
I would like ~cards.text~ this time, please.
Oh, shoot. I'm not sure. I think I'll take... ~cards.text~. Thanks!
Oh, umm... I think I'll go with... ~cards.text~? ~Cards.text~ sounds nice.
Every card deserves a chance to show its true potential! Just kidding. ~Cards.text~ of these cards suck, so please have ~cards.ifplural(them|it)~~ back.
I don't think ~cards.ifplural(these|this)~ ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(are|is)~ going to do me much good, so I'll switch ~cards.ifplural(them|it)~ out.
May I have three cards? Wait, no. Make it two. Actually, uhh, yeah. Make it ~cards.text~. Final answer. Thank you!
I think I'll go with... ~cards.text~. ~Cards.text~ sounds good.
I'll have ~cards.text~. Please and thank you!
This is the second most fun I've had in a bedroom! Besides, y'know, sleeping.
Being alone in this bedroom with all of you makes it feel... more intimate.
This feels like a sleepover! I think we should get some snacks to make it even more accurate!
I wish I'd known we'd be in a bedroom. I would have brought my pajamas! I have some really cute ones!
I've always wanted to go to Paris! Sinners have told me all about it.
♫ When the Moon hits your eye like a big pizza pie... ♫ ...wait, that's Italy, isn't it?
I love the color of these walls! Purple is such a pretty color!
I love the feeling of sand under my bare feet!
I would love to have a date on a beautiful ocean pier. We could share a cheap pizza and talk about our feelings!
I love it when puppies go full zoomy mode! When they're so full of excitement that they can't help but run around aimlessly with their little arfs! They're so precious!
Is there an ice cream flavor that combines white chocolate with joyberries and seahorse dreams? If not, I'll make it happen!
One of our patrons has a cute little pet pig. He likes to bring me "prizes." This morning, I got a rolled up gum wrapper. I love him so much!
The best pranks are the ones that make your friends giggle and laugh!
I can get along with anyone who shares their kindness with others!
Has anyone ever dreamed of sleeping in a bed of cotton candy? Or is it just me?
Few things make me happier than when I can express myself through song!
I adore humans! They’re full of happiness, hopes, and dreams! I only ever get to know them after their lives have ended.
Do any of you keep a journal of cute date ideas for your friends? I'd love to have someone to swap notes with...
It's so nice getting to know all of you! It feels like we're a nice big group of friends!
Is there anything better than sharing a hot bath with someone you love?
I don't think I'll ever get tired of those little novelty blankets that make puppies look like they're wrapped in a burrito.
I love the little pranks our hotel staff plays on each other. I found a skeleton in my shoe this morning!
Niffty talks to herself when she thinks nobody is around. She's a cute little housekeeper.
It's a beautiful day. The sun is shining, the birds are chirping, and there are no violent turf wars in sight!
I'm not used to seeing the sun! It's more beautiful than I'd ever imagined!
The sunshine out here feels so warm and snugly! It makes me want to smile until my cheeks are sore!
I should have brought sunglasses. I don't think my eyes have adjusted to the wonderful sunshine!
Is this magnificent weather typical of Earth? Maybe I should visit more often!
As you may be able to tell, we don't get a lot of sunlight back in Hell. I don't exactly have a tan here!
Playing in the dark is great! You can imagine anything is in the shadows! Like a purple puppy! That sure would be a cool find, wouldn't it?
I love the dark! Well, I mean, I'm kind of used to it. Hell is always dark.
You can't make shadow puppets or light shows without being in the dark!
Would a rave be any fun if it happened in broad daylight? I don't think so! Darkness is an opportunity for something special.
My fireworks look a lot better when it's dark out. That's... not very surprising. I'm sure you know how fireworks work.
Oh wow, the stars here are so cool! I bet it would be so relaxing to lie under the stars and just... look at them.
They say crazy things happen after dark... I guess we'll find out if that's true!
What feels more relaxing than fresh sand on your bare feet? Seriously, please tell me. I'd love to feel even more comfortable!
Maybe when we're finished, we can build a sand castle! With flags, and a tower, and oooh! We definitely need a moat!
Sand is kinda like snow, right? Maybe we could have a sandball fight?
Winner gets to bury me in the sand!
Would it be okay if I took a seashell home with me? Or two? Or twenty?
My favorite popsicles are the rocket pops. Not just because they're shaped like rockets. They taste nice, too!
Shall we play a game of towel tag? My sorority sisters and I used to love that game, but they didn't like how fierce I was with it!
Did anyone bring any bath bombs? The fruitier the scent, the better!
The steam in here is great for the lungs! I'm used to breathing dirty, basalty air.
There's nothing more relaxing than a nice hot shower after a long, exhausting day!
I have a collection of loofahs with cute little animals in the middle. My favorite one has a yellow flamingo, I call him Samson! ...Is that weird?
Whatever dad jokes you may have heard, I doubt they're as groan-worthy as Alastor's. They're so bad, they wrap back around to being funny!
There aren't really any rules in Hell, so you have to learn to make do on your own.
I hope I didn't forget to wish our bartender a good morning today!
I've lived in Hell for two hundred years. I can handle anything this game throws at me.
Hell really isn't that bad... I mean, yes, it's filled with suffering, drug users, sexual deviants, and anarchy, but I know there's a beautiful, shining spirit in every sinner!
I've been thinking, who would make a good cook at the Hotel? I sure would love to have Vaggie's Salvadorian cuisine around!
~Player~, are you thinking what I'm thinking?
What would make good background music for the lobby at the Happy Hotel? I'm looking for something relaxing that puts you in a good mood, but doesn't stick out too much.
I found the biggest spider I've ever seen under my bed last night. No, it wasn't Angel Dust. I carefully took it outside. It wasn't hurting anything.
A smile and a wave goes a long way towards making a good impression!
An ussie is always better than a selfie. I prefer to share my moments with a friend!
Perhaps I should have worn a human disguise so that I wouldn't stand out so much.
Some demons are sinners who get sent down to Hell, but I was born and raised there. Just a fun piece of trivia for you.
Our first patron is such a flirt. His confidence is certainly through the roof!
What brightens your day quite like a bundle of colorful balloons?
Has something made you smile today?
A smile in the morning is as important as butter on toast!
Have you ever heard a puppy make an angry little "arf?" It's the cutest thing!
It's so fascinating meeting new people. Everyone has their own little quirks that make them special and unique.
So... whose bedroom is this, anyway? We aren't invading anyone's property by being here, are we?
There's nothing that yanks my noodle harder than someone who's given up on being happy.
Sometimes I wonder if people want to be unhappy. If you aren't willing to try, you can't expect anything to change.
This is when I would like to say, "At least I have my Dad's support!" But that wouldn't be true.
Oh, don't worry, Lucifer. Just raise a beautiful child in Hell and crush all her dreams. After all, it's her fault she's a failure!
Despite what you may assume, being Princess of Hell doesn't have many perks or privileges. I can't even appear on TV without being laughed at!
I don't get people who think it's foolish to be optimistic. What's wrong with wanting to see the best in people?
If I had a dime for every demon who laughed at my dreams, I could topple the anarchic economy of Hell.
It breaks my heart to see thousands of souls be exterminated each year in my kingdom. Guilty or not, nobody deserves that!
The audacity of some demons. They can't even get my name right! It's not "Charlotte," "Charlene," or "Charlize"; it's Charlie! How hard is that to remember?
Some people say my goals are impossible, and that people can't change. But I think most people aren't even given the opportunity to change!
Pro tip: If you ever get into a fistfight with a reporter on live TV... well... pray nobody was watching that channel.
Vaggie says that life's not a musical and not every problem in the world can be solved by singing, but wouldn't it be so much easier if it were a musical?
Apathy is easy. It's a cowardly attitude and I hate it. If you don't care, you don't have to face your conscience. How convenient!
Sometimes... I wish I could just be struck by lightning and not have to face being a failure. But if that happened, I wouldn't get to help anyone!
Sometimes I feel like there's nobody left for me to trust in the world. Like even my best friends may turn on me any second if I make a mistake.
Do you ever hear a song so good, it gets stuck in your head and you can't remember what it is? It's like it's always just out of reach!
There are so many things in the world that we may never understand. About why people are they way they are. But we can always try.
There are so many places in the Seven Rings that I wish I could take Vaggie. Damn rules...
After I got into a fight on nine-circle TV, I started getting... interesting fan letters. I'm flattered, but, did they have to go into so much detail?
Hell will be a much nicer place when I take the throne. No more fire, screams, or commercials that are louder than the program!
Don't you hate it when men tell you to smile, but don't even try to give you any reason to? Like, back the fuck off.
At least we can comfortably be ourselves with just us ladies.
It's nice not to have any men around who think we're only here to "impress them."
Catcalling is a regular thing in Hell. Demons think it's funny to pick on the pretty princess of Hell, but they stop laughing when they're on fire.
I dream of a world where I can be more than "just a pretty lady." Where my ideas aren't ridiculed and my speaking isn't interrupted at the first chance.
Every time I go to the beach, I end up with sand in every crevice of my body. I guess that doesn't change on Earth!
I think I'll be picking the sand out of my shoes forever. Maybe I'll just get a new pair.
If a seagull shits on me, I'm wiping it on the dealer. He should be rewarding my wicked smile with better cards!
I hope I don't get sunburned. We don't get much sunlight in Hell!
I see spots everywhere. Is it from staring at the sun too much? It's so beautiful, I can't help it!
On a particularly hot day in Hell, the sand always feels too hot on my feet. But then the water is always too cold! What's up with that?
You know what would make today better? Freeing my feet from these damn heels. I think I'll do that right now, actually!
Very little feels better than throwing your heels off after a long day. And you know what? Now's a good time. Why wait until I lose another hand?
You know what feels fantastic? Freeing your feet after wearing heels all day. No time like the present, now that I think about it!
Do you like my new look? I'm partial to the polka dot design, myself. I think it looks cute!
You know, lying is a sin... though would that send you to hell? Can robots even go to hell? That's a good question...
Oh! Happy birthday, Miss Gisborn! I hope the day has been going well for you!
Ms. Wiki, please calm down! I'm sure Polly didn't mean it!
I have secrets, yes. But they wouldn't be secrets anymore if I told you about them, now would they?
Little lies? U-um, I guess they're okay? I will need some more context as to what kind of lies, though...
I don't condone smoking... not that I hate the smell of smoke or anything. I mean, I grew up in Hell and all.
...I... have a complicated relationship with my family. I'd rather not talk about it.
Um... well, I personally wouldn't, if they have moved on and truly regret it, but it's really not my place to say why people get sent down here.
Oops... Does it count if I think I am that person?
♫ Lady Luck never smiles, so lend your love to me awhile! ♫
Arriving in the human world was simply a matter of finding someone with a grimoire I could use to come to the surface!
So you're a goddess and I'm a demon, and we're playing poker together. Isn't that ironic?
...Do demons count as monsters? I suppose in some worlds, they might, but I do not think I am a monster.
We have hell-hounds and succubi down here, but I don't really know if they count.
The biggest monsters we have down here are those who refuse to better themselves!
I like any music that I can sing along to... ooh! I could sing something right now if you want!
Oh, I have plenty of stories! I certainly have a lot to tell since I opened the Hotel!
Oh! Oh! I like so many songs! I have some of my own! You and I should sing together sometime, Marceline!
I don't have any pets, but our client Angel Dust has a pig, Fat Nuggets. He's so adorable!
Am I going to get sunburn out here? We don't have a sun in Hell, so I've never needed to worry about it.
Strip poker is a relatively harmless game, all things considered. I've seen some rounds of Monopoly that have ended much, much worse.
If overindulging on happiness is a bad thing, then maybe I don't always want to be right. Fudge cake tastes too good to stress about it.
My dad is prone to his fits of rage, and... as much as I hate to admit it, the apple doesn't fall far from the tree.
They say that rage only leads to a shorter life, but... demons are immortal, so that doesn't always apply.
I think every sinner deserves the chance to turn their life, or, u-umm, their afterlife around. Does that make sense?
It's weird not seeing any fires blazing outside. Or hearing terrorized screams in the distance. Earth is so... quiet!
I might win this hand. Or... maybe I won't. I'll leave you in suspense!
If I can help just one person avoid ending up in Hell, I've made a difference, and this game will have been worth it!
I think my partner would enjoy this game if she could get over the public nudity thing.
Our patron, Angel Dust, would probably enjoy this game a little too much. I mean, he is a porn star. Remind me never to invite him!
Look, I know it probably sounds weird for me to preach a life without sin while I stand here naked before you, but... just trust me, okay?
There are plenty of beautiful, fun, crazy things in Hell. But I bet you'd be even happier in Heaven!
Our client told me this morning that he "forgot" to put the toilet seat down. How could he forget? It's such a simple thing!
Which sounds better? Demon Disciples? Or Charlie's Angels? For the all-girl band we're starting once we're finished, of course.
That's right! Hell is... kind of a capital for hedonism, as you can imagine, so the Happy Hotel is meant to rehabilitate sinners and send them on a one-way trip to Heaven!
Well, Chara, making deals with a demon is tricky business. I wouldn't recommend it!
Funny you should ask, Chara. I tend to avoid making deals with other demons. I find trust and friendliness to be more effective!
Is this your way of telling me you want to make a deal, Chara?
You have, have you? What kind of things do you know? Good things? Bad things? Should I be concerned?
People on the surface know about me? That's... a little strange. What sorts of things are people saying?
That's right, Fina! I'm the Princess of Hell. My... erm, dad is Lucifer. I'm surprised you haven't heard of him before.
Yup! Most people end up in Hell because they lived a sinful life, but Hell is the only life I've ever known!
The feeling is mutual, Miss Toyo...sato...errr—you can call me Charlie. There's only one Hell, at least as far as I know.
Oh, Saki, you're so kind! I hope we can be friends, I wouldn't ever want to hurt you.
Cuddling is my middle name, Saki! I hope one day that cuddling won't be an unusual thing where I come from.
Is it that obvious that I love to cuddle? I really wear my heart on my sleeve, huh?
Well, yes, Hell is a dangerous place, full of fire, murder, violence, and other assorted crime. Not an ideal place to conduct my mission, I'll admit.
Hell is my home, I was born and raised there, but... it's basically how you've heard it. You're likely to be killed the first day you arrive there!
Well, Princess of Hell is something you have to be born into, my dad being Lucifer and all. I know I don't look like a Princess, but I figure this outfit makes sense for running my Hotel!
...You, erm, might want to hold off on that vacation, Perona. Hell has actually had an overpopulation problem for several years now.
Oh wow, thank you so much! I never get compliments very often, but thank you! And I love the color of your hair!
Oh yes! Singing is one of my greatest passions in life. If you can't get enjoyment from a good song, then what joy can you take from anything?
I suppose by your standards, maybe. Humans only live to 150, right?
Well, 200 is actually pretty young for my family. I don't really have a lot of power over here, but I suppose I could call the Hotel my royal duty?
Wha—again? I lost twice in a row? That shouldn't be possible with my unshakable optimism!
Twice in a row?! Maybe I'm not being positive enough...
Okay, now you have to be kidding me.
Wow. That's three in a row! I need to stop thinking about puppy kisses and start focusing!
I'm beginning to think the dealer really wants to see me naked.
O-oh. I'm first? That doesn't happen very often. Two hundred years of playing poker doesn't give you much of an advantage, does it?
Oh! I'm first? I mean, it's no big deal. I wouldn't have shown up if I was afraid to lose!
Huh? I'm first? But what about my beaming smile and positive thinking? I thought that would give me good luck!
Is it time to let the girls out already?
Damn, this was sooner than I expected. I should practice up on my poker skills...
I may have had the worst hand that round, but I think I still have the biggest smile!
Oops! I probably should have held onto one of those. I had high hopes that I was going to luck out.
Well, that was a stinker. Next round will be better!
Why do I always think luck will grace me with a flush?
This isn't too bad. I've still got my positive attitude!
Here's the skinny: Hell has an overpopulation problem, and no one has found a non-violent way to solve it, yet.
So here's the deal: Hell has become overrun with sinners these days, and I'm hoping to solve that problem non-violently.
As I'm sure you can imagine, there's an ever growing population of sinners in Hell. It's getting to be too much.
The Happy Hotel is full of wonderful people with fascinating stories!
I'm lucky to have such a wonderful hotel staff! Each and every one of them has something special to bring to the table.
My team at the Happy Hotel are more than just staff—they're my friends!
What a great time to get started!
Perfect! Now it's time to get more comfortable.
It's always nice to feel included!
Hmmm. I was wondering when it would be my turn.
I didn't think I was ever going to lose!
Well, I've been thinking about it for a long time now, but I kind of figure people would want to reform? After all, Hell has been overpopulated for some time now...
Well, I don't know what A24 is, but you should know that I maintain soul ownership of this establishment!
I... wouldn't know what those places are, but yes, it's heavily overpopulated! That's why I've created the Happy Hotel, in the hopes to rehabilitate sinners!
Haha, no, my dad's way too busy to spend time doing that. He spends more of his time claiming souls on the surface and... being disappointed in me.
It's called the Happy Hotel! It's... um... in Hell. I don't know if there's any way to visit it, unless you come down here, of course, but I wouldn't really advise that.
Oh? What's your castle like? I don't know if it could accommodate even half of our population, but that's still a very generous offer!
I'd like to think that Hell will turn pink when, hah, you know... after more of my people learn the joys of redemption...
I have great taste in a lot of things! Like, uhh... desserts... and pajamas! Oh, and table manners. So the desserts don't get on my pajamas.
Don't you think you could use a warm hug, Chara? Or a friendly letter? Or a bright smile in the morning?
You're looking at the best scrapbooker in the underworld, Chara. You could have a well-organized keepsake, including every memory of our friendship!
Oh? Did ~player~ offer you a back rub? A spa treatment? A hand holding session?
~Player~ must have offered you something really good! Does it involve acts of service, or physical affection?
Well, Chara, they say you can't trust a demon as far as you can throw them, but I'm a better thrower than people expect!
Whoa, Miko, that's a lot of names. Are you making those up on the fly?
Well, Miko, I would tell you, but then I would have to hug you, and I might not let go!
I'm sure you're one tough cookie, Saki, but nobody's ever left Hell like that before!
I don't think many demons would want to run into you if you ever did end up in Hell, Saki.
Oh, Saki, I'm sure you're much too sweet and kind to ever end up in Hell!
That's what I'm trying to do, actually! That's why I established the Hazbin Hotel, a place where sinners can be rehabilitated and sent to Heaven!
I must admit, I've been through a lot but I never thought I'd be out here getting naked in public. That's, like, something Angel would do.
Do you have a sunburn, or are you always this hot?
Boy, things are starting to get steamy! You know, they say that all the best things happen on the roof!
Have you ever wondered how many people have thought about you romantically?
Have you ever looked deeply into someone's eyes, and really "listened" to what you saw?
Do you ever wish you could tell your past self not to say that stupid thing to your partner?
Have you ever wondered what happens to the rest of the world when you're not around, parading your fancy?
Sinners act like it's crazy to help others feel good. Hell, I guess I'm crazy, then.
Bringing smiles to other people isn't just fun; it's imperative for a fulfilling night life.
I've been around for a long time, but it hasn't felt very long to me. Hell, I don't even know ~player~'s story, yet.
Our first patron at the Happy Hotel is a flamboyant spider demon named Angel Dust. He's... a porn star. He's very protective of his image.
Our bartender is a charming fellow! He's a cat demon named Husk. His short temper is alleviated by his adorable little hat.
Alastor, the Radio Demon, is serving as the hotel's concierge. He's sketchy as fuck and menacingly evil.
Our housekeeper is a little one-eyed chatter box named Niffty. But don't let her size fool you...
Have you ever seen something good happen to someone you care about, but you can't help but wish it had happened to you instead?
There are times when I've woken up and not been in the mood to get out of bed, or to do anything, really. So I just stayed in.
Do you ever get so mad that you want to just incinerate the evil of this world and laugh at its screams as it succumbs to the literal inferno of your rage?
Love is a mighty emotion that comes with a price. It lives with an awesome responsibility.
I have a confession to make... sometimes, I can't help but over indulge myself on life's joys. I'm like a pig!
My mission at the hotel is really important to me. Nothing would make me happier than to see it succeed.
At first glace, Hell looks like a terrible place. Everyone for themselves, trust no one, stab everyone in the back. My people aren't given a chance to love.
I've been called a failure. I feel their doubts. I hear their laughter. But it shouldn't bother me.
I have to admit, playing this game with all of you feels a little bit naughty...
I know what you're thinking. "Why is Charlie playing strip poker? Doesn't she want to discourage sin?"
It might sound a little weird to hear me preach about sin... during a game of strip poker.
Is it getting hot as hell in here, or is it just me?
Boy, it sure is heating up in the Inventory, isn't it?
Want to grab me by the horns? It would be one hell of a ride!
I run the Happy Hotel. We take in sinners from Hell, and redeem them so they can happily ascend to heaven!
I've founded a place where sinners can turn a new leaf, and ascend to Heaven. I call it the Happy Hotel!
I dream of a Hell without sin! At the Happy Hotel, we're helping sinners become good citizens. I'll make my dream a reality, one sinner at a time!
My mission at the Happy Hotel is to rehabilitate sinners! I hope to solve Hell's overpopulation with ascension.
I believe everyone deserves a second chance, whether they're a serial killer, cannibal, or a jerk who talks in the theatre. That's why I've opened the Happy Hotel!
You don't have to tell me. I'm reminded every day that people don't believe in my mission. But I believe everyone deserves a shot at redemption!
You... could say that. But yes, in many ways, Hell is punishment enough for the sinners who live here. Dad doesn't even need to intervene.
...Get it? Soul ownership? Like... all the souls we'll be sending up to heaven?
Um... I don't know what you mean. My city is Hell... In fact, people on the surface are technically not even supposed to know it exists.
Not really any one single person, Fluttershy. But it just breaks my heart to see so many souls be purged every year with no hope of a second chance.
That's what I want to know, Colress. I believe that everyone has a good heart deep within, even if they have done bad things. But some people don't believe.
I believe that the first step to redeeming yourself is acknowledging that you have made mistakes. You're already on your way, Colress.
I've never thought about that, but I don't think so? I was born in Hell, after all. But I don't need to go to Heaven; helping other people is its own reward!
I should have worn a human disguise... If other demons found out I was getting naked on the surface, I'd be in trouble.
But I know that Angel cares about others. It won't be easy, but we'll find a way to reach him.
I can tell he's making significant progress! He just needs a few months to get accustomed to the Hotel, and he'll be heaven-bound, like the Angel he is!
He isn't very friendly, but I'm sure that after a few days with the rest of us, he will come around to enjoy it!
My partner, Vaggie, doesn't like the idea of a bar in our hotel, but I think it'll be a way to help us all wind down.
I think I can lead him to righteousness, though. Anyone with a smile as big as his has to have some good in them!
But I learned one thing from my dad: "Ya don't take shit from other demons!" So I won't fall for his... trickster... voodoo magic!
To think, with billions of people out there, imagine how many people would enjoy you if they got to meet you?
It can feel almost... invasive. And vulnerable. Isn't it beautiful? Seeing someone for all their gifts, and flaws? I find it very intimate!
How enviable it would be to tell your past self that everything will be okay. As long as you don't eat your bbf's leftover pupusas!
What is done cannot be undone, and realizing that is a part of personal growth. But sometimes, I still wish I had a time machine. I've made some silly mistakes!
Can you imagine what would we do without ~random~ brightening up our day?
I want to believe people are just afraid to get hurt again, that the hope is still there. But I don't know. My brain tells me to give up, but my heart tells me I can't!
Caring about others will bring both ups and downs to your life. It's like a rollercoaster! A rollercoaster I love to ride.
My point of view is so small in the grand scheme of things. I want to know more—I cherish every single life story that's shared with me!
If you love yourself enough, you'll find joy in the happiness of others.
I'm talking sweat pants, a cute girlfriend, and some terrible television. Doing nothing can be decadent.
Rage is just a symptom of being passionate about something. That's why I'm no stranger to anger.
Maybe that was a little too specific.
I think love is power. If you routinely relate your intimate feelings to someone who cares about you, you'll make someone very happy.
Two hundred years just isn't long enough to enjoy every hot fudge cake, every refreshing bubble bath, or every hug from your fuck buddy!
But it isn't just my mission anymore. Love must be shared. I know I can count on all of you to do that!
I will show them how rewarding it can be to help someone else. When you help one person, you've helped everybody!
They'll know soon enough. My people will feel the freedom of righteousness!
Niffty has the heart of a giant. I don't think anything could deter her!
Niffty has big ambitions, and her fashion-sense is second to none!
Most people laugh when I tell them that.
It hasn't been easy to find people who believe in my cause, though.
Our first patron hasn't fully bought-in to the mission, yet. But I'm sure he'll come around.
Our mission hasn't gained much traction in Hell, yet.

So... do you do this often, ~name~?
Can you imagine if this game were just between the two of us?
There's no way you're that well practiced, right, ~name~? You're a good soul, aren't you?
At least this time I'm not seeing it from the corner of my eye down a back alley.
I give you permission to think of me if you want to.
It's supposed to be a "punishment" for losing, but ~name~ isn't making his situation look bad at all!
I must admit this is a weird context for it, but I always enjoy seeing others happy.
Is ~name~ ever going to finish?
I hope you're not empty.
Did you leave any in the tank for later?
If you're not completely dry now, you will be...
It's only sinful if you don't clean up your mess.
Well, then. That was a lot more than I expected.
That's... a lot of joy!
It's nice that you can make yourself feel so good...!
You, uh... really went to town there, didn't you?
You're planning on cleaning that, right? ...Gosh, now I'm just wondering what Niffty would think if you didn't.
Wow, it looks like you, uh, needed that. Um, I hope it was good!
I think we should all let ~name~ catch his breath.
Yes, that's a perfect way of thinking about it, Nagisa! Imagine you're putting on a performance!
If it helps, try to imagine us all naked! ...Which almost all of us are. So I guess you're not imagining much.
Is this your first time doing this in front of others, ~name~? I can imagine how difficult that might be.
Don't worry, ~name~, you are not alone! ...Or is that exactly the problem?
Should... should I be watching this? I really don't know... It wouldn't hurt anybody, right? We're all friends here...
Do you have stage fright, ~name~? I'd understand that. I might look like a natural-born performer, but I have my moments, too.
Join me, ~name~! We can be masturbation buddies! ...th-that's a thing, right?
If it helps, you can watch me. Consider me your encouragement!
If it helps, try to imagine us all naked! ...Which some of us already are. That sounded a lot better in my head...
You can share what you're thinking about, if you want.
Who do you normally think about when you do this, ~name~?
Does... does repeating that word help?
If you're having trouble, ~name~, feel free to think of me if you want. I don't mind.
Are you... thinking of me while doing this? I must admit, I am flattered if so!
Try to save some for later, ~name~.
How's it feeling over there, ~name~? Need anything?
Don't worry, ~name~. Lust is only sinful if it comes in unhealthy amounts.
I didn't expect ~name~ to get so into it! Not that I'm complaining.
You're on your way down to the third ring of Hell at this rate, ~name~!
Is it rude to look? I mean, this is what we came to see, isn't it?
I hope it's not to distasteful to like, you know, take a few quick glances...
You don't have to worry about word getting out or anything, ~name~. I don't think anyone in Hell even knows you—not that I would do such a thing anyway!
I hope someone brought a towel or something. ~Name~'s on a roll.
So, ~name~... was it good? I can tell you've been looking forward to this.
Wow! Are you giving lessons, ~name~?
I hope you didn't exhaust yourself too much.
I bet this won't be the last time I see you do that.
Aren't life's pleasures beautiful and mighty?
I think we should all let ~name~ catch her breath.
Looks like someone had a good time!
Was it everything you hoped it would be?
Congratulations... n-now just a bit more and I'll be right there with you...
Doh! I really shouldn't have been so aggressive with my cards!
Oh... oh dear, I'm first. I'm really getting put on the spot now...
Oh well. I'm used to providing the inspiration, anyway.
Technically, I'm the winner, because I get to do this first!
Well... self love isn't a bad thing, right?
It's not a sin if it's the rule, right? Right?
It's about time. I thought I was going to get blue balled.
Is this what you wanted, ~player~? You naughty ~player.ifMale(boy|little lady)~.
I'm getting butterflies in my stomach. Hopefully they're the pretty kind.
Why am I so nervous? This isn't the first time I've done this with other people...
I hope I don't accidentally make any goofy faces.
In any case, I've had two hundred years of practice. Watch and learn.
Here's a little secret... I may have been looking forward to this outcome...
Isn't it weird how this game rewards you for playing badly?
There's nothing better after a long day than coming home to a warm kiss on the cheek from someone you love...
You know your partner is special when they save the last chocolate in the box for you!
I think I'll add this to my fun activities list.
It's surprising how often hair ends up in your mouth when you're sharing your love with a nice lady.
I love it when a bilingual person gets so into it that they blurt their feelings in their native tongue.
Do you like seeing me like this, ~player~? It's okay, we can let that sin slide.
It's okay, ~player~. You can watch me.
I hope you're not thinking of anything too naughty, ~player~.
Am I putting on a good show?
(She kisses my neck, and plays with my hair...)
(She unbuttons my sweaty shirt and peels it off after a long day...)
(I pull down her dress straps, my hands running up and down her back...)
(My fingers run through her hair as I whisper in her ear...)
(That birthday cake she made me was so thoughtful. It had all six of my favorite flavors!)
(Smooth jazz, a steamy bathtub, the smell of lilacs in the air...)
(The soft touch of her hands on my back, sliding back and forth like the falling tides on a gentle beach...)
(Her lips are so graceful and comforting...)
There's a rainbow inside me!
¡Te amo mi amiga de pelo blanco!
My soul is smiling!
Mmmh... I haven't done that for so long... I've been so tense since the hotel has opened...
W-wow... I haven't gotten to relax like that since the hotel opened...
Self pleasure isn't a sin. Your body has needs.
Now that I think of it, I wonder if tourism into Hell would be possible? A number of demons back there would definitely see it as a window of opportunity.
I hope nobody shows up at the Hotel while I'm gone. I'm sure our friends could handle it, though. Right, Nuggy?
I think the first thing I'll do when I get back home is take a nice, hot shower.
I remember the first day I laid eyes on this cute little piggy. He tracked dirt on the hotel floor, but I wasn't even mad. Isn't he precious?!
I bet this feels like home to Fat Nuggets with what his owner gets up to!
I sure am glad I had a towel to wash myself off before you came here, Nuggy. This would be pretty awkward otherwise!
How is Angel doing, Nuggy? He hasn't been getting in any more trouble while I'm gone, has he?
There really is nothing like having a companion to pet, love, and kiss! Do any of you have a pet that you cherish?
I would love for any of you to visit me and this little piggy in Hell, if you could find a way to do it!
Pigs are surprisingly smart! They can learn tricks and respond to commands!
After meeting Fat Nuggets, I just couldn't bring myself to eat bacon for breakfast anymore!
Is there anything better than a romantic dinner with gentle live music and a smoking hot date?
I'm still surprised that I won! But this was still a great experience for me, ~player~, and I had a helluva time!
You know, ~player~, I could always use a hand at the Hotel! But... that would require that you die first, so no rush or anything!
I hope my tremendous success at this game is inspiring all of you to think positively!
This was an enlightening experience, ~player~!
Don't feel so down, ~player~. Now you can tell your friends you've seen a demon's underwear before!
♫ Though not lacking in skill, I'm surprised that I won. The game may be over, but it sure was fun! ♫
Well, you certainly saw... another side of me, but I hope you had fun, ~player~! I know I sure did!
This was a good time for all, and I'm glad to finally have a taste of the human world!
Phew, that was a close one... now if you'll excuse me, I need to get back to work before our patrons wreck the place!
The real victory is the hearts I've touched with my cheer and song!
I hope I've helped all of you smile! That's more important to me than winning a game.
Bam! Not a single loss. That's the power of positivity!
Positive thinking is undefeated!
Look... promise me none of you will tell my dad or anyone else about this, okay? I don't want the Hotel's reputation ruined more.
Well, ~player~, I think we all learned a lesson or two today about each other. I hope you keep that in mind after you leave!
I hope you had a good time, ~player~! Now I should probably clean off before I head back to Hell...
So I still failed... but in a way, I also won! That counts for something!
If any of you happen to die soon, I'd prefer that you keep this on the down low.
Well, ~player~, I think we've all learned something about each other! I hope to see you again, soon.
I hope you had a good time, ~player~! Now I should probably clean off before Nugs and I head back to Hell...
So I still failed... but in a way, I also won! That counts for something!
So I lost the game, but it doesn't count as losing if I had fun doing it!
You little rascal! I've grown on you quickly, haven't I?
This place must feel like home with what your owner gets up to!
How am I supposed to tell Angel Dust I played strip poker with his pig? He'd probably be upset I didn't invite him...
Everyone, I'd like you to meet Fat Nuggets! He belongs to one of my patrons. Isn't he precious?
This is my pal, Fat Nuggets. I hope he becomes your pal, too!
This little guy is Fat Nuggets: cutest damn pig at the Happy Hotel!
My philosophy only works if you believe there's greatness in everybody.
*Oh!* Nuggy! How did you get here?
N-Nuggy! Did you follow me here?
Huh? Nuggy? What are you doing here?
Miss Wiki, stahp! You're making my brain hurt!
I'm sure Nuggy would love that! He loves meeting new people!
